meanings: (기운이 빠지다) be[get, become] tired, be exhausted, be worn out, (formal) be fatigued
(싫증이 나다) be (sick and) tired (of), (informal) be fed up (with), be weary[bored] of (doing)
(얼음 위를 달리다) slide[play] on the ice, (스케이트를 신고) skate

vlive.korean: 나 안 지치는데? 지치면 얼른 쉬어요, 안녕! I'm not tired yet. Rest if you are. Bye! 듣기 View video TWICE : SANA
vlive.english: I'm not tired yet. Rest if you are. Bye!

vlive.korean: 얘들아, 지치면 안 돼. - 그렇지. Kids, you guys can't be tired just yet. - That's right. 듣기 View video NCT : NCT LIFE 예능 수련회 EP 02
vlive.english: Kids, you guys can't be tired just yet. - That's right.

vlive.korean: '지치면 지는 겁니다. 미치면 이기는 겁니다.' "You will lose when you are tired. You will win when you are crazy". 듣기 View video iKON : 브이나잇 from.동동 (아홉번째 밤)
vlive.english: "You will lose when you are tired. You will win when you are crazy".

vlive.korean: 몸과 마음이 지치면 다시 원래의 컨디션으로 끌어올려야 하잖아요. We need to refresh our mind and body when we're worn out. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] GFRIEND YUJU & EUNHA X Orgel Live - 여자친구 유주&은하의 오르골라이브!
vlive.english: We need to refresh our mind and body when we're worn out.

vlive.korean: 많은 사람들과 시간을 엄청 에너지 있게 보내고 집에 돌아가면 지치는 거 아니에요? Wouldn't you feel tired after spending some time with many people? 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
vlive.english: Wouldn't you feel tired after spending some time with many people?

examples.korean: Children often get fractious and tearful when tired. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아이들은 지치면 쉽게 짜증을 내고 잘 운다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Children often get fractious and tearful when tired. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They eat, then they fight, and when they’re tired of fighting, they eat again, then they sleep, and a whole day passes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 먹고, 싸우고, 싸움에 지치면 다시 먹고, 잠을 잔다. 그리고 나면 하루가 지난다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: They eat, then they fight, and when they’re tired of fighting, they eat again, then they sleep, and a whole day passes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: When I get tired I'll let you know. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 지치면 알려 줄게. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 glvh925(glvh****)
